questions.quote: Listen. Let me ask you something. If you and Mona were ever to... dance, how do you decide who leads? I mean... do you take turns? Do you discuss it beforehand? How does that work?
Look, you said the one in the second courtyard. He was in the second courtyard.
Well my friend,  it may be time to consider the dreaded apparatus.
Aw, c'mon, you love that car. What about the Northstar system?
Because great couples always have a great story about how they met. That's why I've never been in a long term relationship. I've never had a good meeting story.
Alright, alright, fine. You take the monkey's side, alright, go ahead.
Really , like a... like a.... Jerry, I want to slide my tongue around you like a snake.....Ooooooooooha ,oooooohaaaa.....
No, no, no, it's o.k. I don't care about the keys. It's my fault. I gave the keys away with my stupidity. I broke "the covenant of the keys."
Yeah, the woman I grew up with in Maryland, she moved here last year...
I just wanted to talk to him for a minute, but I'll come back.
